title: The Apple AR/VR headset should work seamlessly with your iPhone
description: A new patent outlines how the Apple AR/VR headset might play nicely with other Apple gadgets you've got.

title: Apple wants to restrict this ChatGPT-using email app for a rather interesting reason
description: Email client BlueMail has been blocked by Apple over AI upgrade, but developer Blix is hitting back.

title: iPhone 15 Pro rumored to be getting revamped physical buttons
description: Apple may well switch up the switches on the next iPhone series, as well as moving to solid-state buttons.

title: Quordle today - hints and answers for Sunday, March 5 (game #405)
